name: Swipe Bo Xmas: Mind blowing logical blocks sliding puzzle for iPhone
name_original: Swipe Bo Xmas: Mind blowing logical blocks sliding puzzle for iPhone
description:
Limited time discount promotion - get game for Free now!!!

Play and challenge your logical thinking! Get all candies to open Xmas portal and move on next level. Fresh and cute puzzle with eye-catching graphics and intuitive game-play.

Game starts simply and progress to levels that requires your brain power. During the game you became introduced with new elements, which make game more and more challenging and entertaining.

In X-mas version we have added new element: "Magic snowflake". It give you freedom to freeze and destroy game objects on your own.

Game Highlights
• 40 unique and exciting Xmas levels
• Eye-catching graphics
• Game Center support
• Magic snowflake to freeze and destroy walls
• Interactive game-play elements: portals, forwarders, sliding blocks and much more...
• Hours of fun and challenge

Don't miss your chance to PLAY Swipe Bo Xmas game - you will LOVE IT!
